mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM complaints c INNER JOIN ReplyComplaints rc ON c.complaintsId = rc.complaintsId) AS replycnt FROM complaints c LEFT JOIN complaintsResult cr ON c.complaintsResult = cr.`NO` order by complaintsId desc
mapper.insert: insert into complaints(complaintsTitle, complaintsContent, complaintsWriter) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer});
mapper.update: update complaints set complainsTitle = #{title}, complainsContent = #{content}, complainsWriter = #{writer} where complaintsId = #{no}
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from complaints;
mapper.insert: insert into ReplyComplaints(complaintsId, replyComplaintsWriter, replyComplaintsContent) values(#{boardNo}, #{replyWriter}, #{replyContent})
mapper.update: update ReplyComplaints set replyComplaintsWriter = #{replyWriter}, replyComplaintsContent = #{replyContent} where replyComplaintsId = #{replyNo}
